previous.excerpt: Write concisely by substituting "very" + "adjective" with a more concise adjective that has the spirit of very contained within it.
previous.title: Lose the Very - "Very good english" is not very good english. Lose the very.

localize.description: 用一个更简洁的形容词来代替“非常”+“形容词”，这样写起来就简洁了。
localize.tagline: “非常好的英语”不是很好的英语。失去最好的。

localize.description: 用一個更簡潔的形容詞來代替“非常”+“形容詞”，這樣寫起來就簡潔了。
localize.tagline: “非常好的英語”不是很好的英語。失去最好的。
